description: Success message for bulk untagging items
Text to display if no tags found
Button for commiting the action of untagging of a number of items in bulk
Title of dialog warning after bulk untagging items
defaultMessage: Tags will be removed from eligible items

description: Body of dialog warning that bulk untagging items
defaultMessage:
The {tags} tag will be removed from selected items that have this tag. if a tag is not found in a selected item, the item will be unaffected.

This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
